City Council
============

1716 W Main Street Gun Barrel City TX 75156

[Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/1716+W+Main+Street+Gun+Barrel+City+TX+75156)  
  
 Physical Address:View Map

1716 W Main Street  
Gun Barrel City, TX 75156

Link: [City Council Page](https://www.gunbarrelcity.gov/176/City-Council)

### Contact Us

1. 1716 West Main Street  
   Gun Barrel City, TX 75156
2. Phone: [903-887-1087](tel:9038871087)  
   Fax: 903-887-6666  
   [Email City Hall](mailto:info@gunbarrelcity.net)
3. Monday through Friday  
   7:30 am to 4 pm
